Tang Zhihong, the director of the Huanggang Municipal Health Commission, who was dismissed for being “ignorant” of the epidemic, has now been appointed as the director of the Legal Affairs Committee of the Huanggang Municipal People’s Congress Standing Committee

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
A parent said that on the evening of February 18, teachers from various schools organized to watch "The First Lesson of School", which was distributed to parents by teachers from various places. Nearly 100,000 parents of junior high school students watched it alone.
But what surprised him was that during the actual viewing process, Zhidao Youxue's courses were constantly being promoted, which puzzled him very much.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to The Paper, the Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs website published 12 Chinese positions on the political solution to the Ukrainian crisis on February 24, including respecting the sovereignty of all countries, abandoning the Cold War mentality, ceasefire and end the war, start peace talks, resolve the humanitarian crisis, maintain nuclear safety, and promote post-war reconstruction.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 23, a netizen passed by the Jixiangyuan community in Urumqi where the fire occurred.
The gate of the community is still sealed. There are more than a dozen police officers and plainclothes officers patrolling the streets. When someone takes out his mobile phone to take pictures of the community, plainclothes officers immediately stop him.
On the left side of the second picture, the unit where the fire occurred has been repainted, but the roof still shows signs of being burned.

name: 李老师不是你老师

On the evening of February 22, at Shenzhen Longhua Bus Station, a large number of migrant workers were stranded outside the station because the factory was not hiring.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On February 24, a real estate project in Cangzhou, Hebei Province, was delayed in starting construction after the Chinese New Year. The owners organized to go to the Housing and Construction Bureau to seek an explanation from the government and safeguard their rights. During the process, 7 people were detained.
One owner posted the video on Kuaishou and Douyin platforms, and was called by the Internet police to delete it.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On February 23, in Shangtun Village, Liaobu Town, Dongguan City, the construction party started construction because the villagers did not receive the compensation they deserved, which led to villagers protesting at the construction site.
During the period, the public clashed with the police, and used umbrellas to block the arrest of protesters to prevent video and photography.

Now Evergrande is finished, Shandong Expressway has also run away, China Railway Construction has taken over the construction, and the construction period has been delayed again and again.
People kneel down to petition

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On February 22, the relevant departments of Hunan reported that Su Jiawu, the former Party Secretary of Gantang Village, Lijiaping Town, Shaoyang County, illegally appropriated a total of 46,100 yuan in orphan living subsidies for five years for the family's daily living expenses.
The local Civil Affairs Bureau said that the orphan subsidy was mistakenly distributed to the village secretary.

This article was immediately ridiculed by the public, and some netizens said that my country should first implement a five-day work week
